main event: A UFO was visually observed as a bright light and tracked on radar at Godman AFB in Kentucky on 23 January 1953.
interesting points: The object was stationary on radar,Object appeared as a large star-like entity, through binoculars it displayed red flashing lights,Observation lasted for 2 minutes before the object vanished from radar scope,No sound was detected during the observation.
sighted object: bright light resembling a large star with red flashes
witness description: Male, age 49, observed the object from Godman Tower at Ft. Knox.
